scripts.lint: npm run lint:js && npm run lint:css && npm run lint:html
scripts.lint:css: node -e "const fs=require('fs');const css=fs.readFileSync('styles.css','utf8');let d=0;for(const c of css){if(c==='{' )d++;if(c==='}')d--;if(d<0)throw new Error('styles.css com chaves desbalanceadas');}if(d!==0)throw new Error('styles.css com chaves desbalanceadas');if(!css.includes(':root'))throw new Error('styles.css sem bloco :root');console.log('CSS structure OK');"
scripts.lint:html: node -e "const fs=require('fs');const html=fs.readFileSync('index.html','utf8');const checks=['<!DOCTYPE html>','<html','<head>','<body>'];for(const c of checks){if(!html.includes(c))throw new Error('index.html inv√°lido: falta '+c);}console.log('HTML structure OK');"
